title: mAdhavA nannu brOvavA (j)
sahitya:
mAdhavA nannu brovavA shrIdhara sujanAdhAra nA neramulenchaka


anupallavi

  meragAdUra bhava bAdhala nOrva merudhIra ninnE palumAru vEDina


caraNam 1    strIku cIralicci strIku rUpamicci strIkula hitakaruDainAvu
puruSuDani nannu brOva marachitivA purushottamA nA paritApamula dIrchi
   caraNam 2    mosa minka cAlu bhaktula yAsa dIrchi brOvu vrajavanitA ramaNa 
sujana samrakshana bhujaga shayana sadAshivakavi pOSaNa
